translations: adj.不能挽回的；不能复原的；不能收回的

phrs.translation: 不能挽回的, 无可挽救的, 不能收回的, 不可援救的
不可复原蠕变, 不可复蠕变
不可补偿成本, 不能回收的成本
不可复柔量, 不可恢复柔量

sentences.sentence: May be enough to do an irrecoverable damage to it.
sentences.translation: 对它造成难以恢复的损失。

sentences.sentence: They are connected with cherished associations which the new ones can never have. And for this irrecoverable loss，I am to blame.
sentences.translation: 旧书与往事相连，这种不可弥补的损失，皆由我起。

sentences.sentence: After more than a hundred years most of the details are irrecoverable, lost beyond all recall, but it isn't hard to image what must have happened.
sentences.translation: 经过一百多年之后，细节已无从查考，但不难猜测当时的情景。
